# Local Dev
Build project with a watch-like mode.

```bash
python -m pip install -e .
```
# Test
Install Dependencies for Tests
```bash
py -m pip install -e .[test]
```
Run Tests
```bash
py -m pytest tests --verbose
```
# Run
```bash
py src/example.py
```

# Build
```bash
py src/main
```
